resources.string: In order to report kindness, you must enable location services on your device and grant location permissions to this app.
Unknown location services error. You will not be able to report kindness until the error is fixed.
Thank you for reporting an act of kindness.
Tap the plus icon to report kindness near you. Or simply explore details about the /acts of kindness/ of others by zooming in on the map.
Tap the icon that best reflects the kindness you would like to report.
Return to the map to see your new act of kindness added at your location.

Determing your location - The Services deal with location, so in order to work, the Services need to know your location. Whenever you open and use/interact with this app on your mobile device, we use the location information from your mobile device (e.g., latitude and longitude) The information will only be used when you accept to enable your GPS location. Your location will then be used to pin point on the map where an act of kindness occurs. We do not use your GPS location for other reasons. Only when you add a Random act of kindness occurence. If you wish to turn off these services, you are able to turn off your GPS location by going to settings. Next open the Apps tab. Then scroll down and select Configure Apps or App Settings, then App permissions. Here you can select what inforamtion the apps have access to including you location.
